categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: A Jedi was kidnapped by Sith forces and brought to the planet Odacer-Faustin, where the they were to be sacrificed as part of a ritual intended to grant immortality to the Sith Lord Darth Drear. Drear had intended to cut out the Jedi's heart using a sword and consume the organ to complete the immortality ritual, but the Jedi's blood possessed an insufficient amount of midi-chlorians to make the ritual successful. Drear perished as a result of the failure.
